title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 300: Featuring Stanley Cup Champions Alex Killorn & Pat Maroon
description:
On Monday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Stanley Cup Champions Alex Killorn & Pat Maroon. Alex joined (22:20) to discuss the Cup celebration, the Ovi-Maroon weigh off in the bubble, his jetski and tons more. The Big Rig joined (1:10:20) to clear the air on piss gate, talk about the parade, Brayden Point and more. We also discuss the Bettman-ESPN beef, goalies on the move this offseason, RA’s P-Town trip and tons more. edit


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
